mapper.insert: insert into member_address(member_id, recipient_name, postal_code, recipient_address, recipient_detailaddress, recipient_tel, default_delivery_address, type) values (#{member_id}, #{recipient_name}, #{postal_code}, #{recipient_address}, #{recipient_detailaddress}, #{recipient_tel}, #{default_delivery_address}, #{type})
mapper.update: update member_address set recipient_name = #{recipient_name}, postal_code = #{postal_code}, recipient_address = #{recipient_address}, recipient_detailaddress = #{recipient_detailaddress}, recipient_tel = #{recipient_tel}, default_delivery_address = #{default_delivery_address}, type = #{type} where address_id = #{address_id}
update member_address set DEFAULT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS = 0 where MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} and DEFAULT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS = 1
